documents.content:
# California County Child Care Contact Directory (2026)

## Finding Your County Resources

### Quick Lookup
**MyChildCarePlan.org** - Enter your zip code to find local contacts

## Major County Contacts

### Los Angeles County
- **R&R Agencies:** Multiple agencies serve different areas
- **Child Care Alliance of LA:** (213) 480-0700
- **Crystal Stairs:** (323) 421-1500
- **CalWORKs Child Care:** Contact DPSS at 1-866-613-3777

### San Diego County
- **YMCA CRS:** (800) 481-2151 or (619) 521-3055
- **CalWORKs:** (866) 262-9881
- **Website:** ymcasd.org/childcare

### Orange County
- **Child Development Associates:** (714) 543-2273
- **R&R Hotline:** (714) 543-2273
- **CalWORKs:** (800) 281-9799

### San Francisco County
- **Children's Council:** (415) 276-2900
- **SF Human Services:** 311 or (415) 557-5000
- **Website:** childrenscouncil.org

### Alameda County
- **4Cs of Alameda:** (510) 582-2182
- **CalWORKs:** (510) 259-3800
- **Website:** 4c-alameda.org

### Sacramento County
- **CHS/Pathways:** (916) 369-0191
- **CalWORKs:** (916) 874-3100
- **Website:** chs-ca.org

### Santa Clara County
- **Community Child Care Council:** (408) 487-0747
- **CalWORKs:** (408) 758-3800
- **Website:** 4c.org

### Riverside County
- **Child Care Resource Center:** (800) 733-3333
- **CalWORKs:** (877) 410-8829

### San Bernardino County
- **Child Care Resource Center:** (800) 733-3333
- **CalWORKs:** (877) 410-8827

### Fresno County
- **Fresno EOC R&R:** (559) 263-1150
- **CalWORKs:** (559) 600-1717
- **Website:** fresnoeoc.org

## Statewide Resources

### General Information
- **MyChildCarePlan:** rrnetwork.org
- **R&R Network:** rrnetwork.org
- **211:** Dial 211 for local resources

### State Agencies
- **CDSS Child Care:** (916) 657-2628
- **CDE Child Development:** (916) 322-6233

### Licensing Questions
- **Community Care Licensing:** 1-844-538-8766
- **Online:** www.cdss.ca.gov/inforesources/child-care-and-development-licensing

### TrustLine
- **Phone:** 1-800-822-8490
- **Website:** trustline.org

## Hours of Operation

Most R&R agencies:
- **Monday-Friday:** 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM
- **Some have extended hours** - check locally
- **Voicemail/email** available 24/7

## What to Have Ready When Calling

1. Your zip code
2. Ages of children
3. Care schedule needed
4. General income information
5. Any special circumstances (CalWORKs, foster care, etc.)
